channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows GDI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows GDI

item.title: CVE-2018-0750|2024-09-16T22:15:02.504Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20gdi
item.description: The Windows GDI component in Windows 7 SP1 and Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1 allows an information disclosure vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Windows Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
